mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_ID, NAME, PHONE, PET_NAME, PET_TYPE, check_in_date, CHECK_OUT_DATE, MEMO, CREATED_AT) VALUES (RESERVATION_SEQ.nextval, #{name}, #{phone}, #{pet_name} , #{pet_type} , #{check_in_date}, #{check_out_date} , #{memo} ,sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION_ID, NAME, PHONE, PET_NAME, PET_TYPE, CHECK_IN_DATE, CHECK_OUT_DATE, CREATED_AT, MEMO FROM reservation WHERE name = #{name} AND phone = #{phone}
